snippet: The two countries have resolved a trade disagreement that threatened to hold up a multimillion-dollar aid package.
abstract: United States and El Salvador say they have settled their differences over compliance with fine print of trade agreement that threatened to delay aid to small Central American country; timing of dispute is embarrassment for United States, as haggling over program to help poor farmers makes nation's leaders appear tone-deaf.
lead_paragraph: The two countries have resolved a trade disagreement that threatened to hold up a multimillion-dollar aid package.

headline.main: El Salvador Ends Dispute With U.S. Over Seeds
headline.print_headline: El Salvador Ends Dispute With U.S. Over Seeds
